Lines.Speech: OFFICIAL COMMUNICATIONS DOCUMENT FROM INTERGALACTIC HEADQUARTERS. ATTEMPTS TO TAMPER WILL BE MET WITH SEVERE CONSEQUENCES...
...OF SPA MEMBERSHIP REMOVAL AND REVOKED ACCESS TO ON-DEMAND INTERPLANETARY TV PROGRAMS.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Oh damn. Best not touch this file after viewing it.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: God forbid you don't get your weekly pedicure.

[Mission Report]
_Harvest Operation's team was in charge of extracting Mandaryan Crystals, invaluable resource capable of generating 100x more energy than our current fusion system. We lost contact for 72hrs, possibly due to hostile activity. Your orders (by priority) are the following...

1. _Rescue the living.__
2. _Report the deceased.__
3. _Retrieve the crystals.__
Once you have finished, send us your location for immediate extraction. We expect unquestionable integrity in your reports. __Good luck Agent.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: 'Unquestionable Integrity'. From YOU? And they call ME the Artificial Intelligence.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: They're dead. Crystals gone. __Can we go now?
